front.title: Imperial Decree
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. Whenever you control any two Rebel Base locations, or any one planet site and two systems, the effects of Revolution and all opponent's Force drain bonuses are canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: To Imperial command personnel: The Rebellion must be crushed! Minor acts of sedition are to be ignored. The destruction of the Alliance is your primary goal.

combo: Imperial Decree + Walker Garrison Gives all of the benefits of the Walker Garrison deck with extremely minimal adjustments to get the benefits of Imperial Decree.
